data.title: Stunt Performer Spotlight: Paulo Moura
data.meta_description: Featured Interview With Stunt Performer: Paulo Moura
data.text:
Tell about yourself and your background! *

Hey Iâm 30 years old, martial artist, break dancer and musician, Iâve been in the industry for around 5 years doing background and stunts for big and small productions as like Ozark on Netflix, marvel movies, cobra Kai series etc.

What inspired you to become a stunt performer?

Be part of the magic of movies.

What is your greatest skill as a stunt performer, is there a stunt behind it?

Fight choreography

What is the best part about being a stunt performer?

Do all the fun parts of movies and shows, is the best part

Tell your all-time favorite stunt story!

I had some stunts in the walking dead and some other zombie movies that I always play zombie and get kill the weirdest ways possible.

What advice would you give other stunt performers?

Keep training everyday and always be ready for the opportunity.

Anything else you'd like to tell the community about?

Be patient and never give up, is hard but not impossible,

Please share your social media handles and how we can follow you!

My Instagram @stunt.rickman

Please include any links to stunt reels or videos you'd like to share!

https://youtu.be/NIdDyQRBdRI
